title: Price ReducedEnergy Self SufficientCountry Home on the
text:
Price ReducedEnergy Self SufficientCountry Home on the ad date: 10/07/2015 
Price ReducedEnergy Self SufficientCountry Home on the Smith River4125 Big Flat Road, Crescent City, CALovely country home on the Smith River. Updated kitchen, energy efficient stainless appliances, 11 foot island seats six. 2nd floor master suite w/walk-in shower, soaking tub and private deck. Two bedrooms downstairs, walk-in river rock shower, large loft and sun room. Gazebo overlooks path to pristine waters + 300' riverfront. Solar, inverter, batteries, propane, diesel, totally self sufficient. 2 separate parcels leaves 1 for a guest/vacation cabin. Seller is a California licensed real estate sales person. No. 1500419 $449,000Melissa Blackburn, AgentMing Tree Real Estate1000 Northcrest Dr., Crescent City707-954-3505 or 464-9741, #01073103
